long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you have access to some agile tools like "Let's Vote" in which you can create a scrum poker room to estimate your stories, or you can create a link for a "Retrosprint" retrospective tool.
You can share with other colleagues or just type the room id and join an already extisting scrum poker room.
